enhanced_description: Established in 2014, Bitwage is a pioneer and leading provider of Bitcoin, cryptocurrency, and stablecoin payroll solutions, optimizing global team management. It seamlessly integrates with existing payroll and HR systems, offering unparalleled flexibility in currency choice and ensuring efficient compensation for remote workers worldwide. The platform enables direct deposits to up to three wallets and bank accounts on payday and supports financial strategies like dollar-cost averaging for crypto paychecks. Bitwage also includes features such as automated invoicing, expense management, and compliant reporting. It simplifies the process of hiring, managing, and compensating a global workforce, providing a cost-effective and streamlined payroll solution with world-class security, evidenced by zero breaches since 2014 and alignment with ISO and NISO standards.
